content.rendered:
Welcome to the new Coffee with Codefresh — a Q&A live stream with members of the Codefresh team!  This is a community event for both Codefresh employees and customers, or if you are not yet a customer but have questions, you are welcome to join!

We welcome you to a casual and relaxed question and answer session, where we can discuss everything and anything Codefresh and CI/CD… Whether it’s about Cloud automation, DevOps, Docker, Deployments, Rollbacks, Disaster recovery, best practices, or just to get an idea of our product roadmap, the list goes on and on… if you have a question, ask away!

Join us every Thursday at 11:00 AM Pacific..  We’d love to answer any questions, big or small.

We will also post a recording of our session in case you can’t make it!

Click here to add it to your calendar.

We hope to see you there!
